fundingsOnboardingModal.headerTooltip: This tool is only for New Jersey-based businesses. Others can explore NJEDA funding on Business.NJ.gov.

pageHeader.subHeaderText: Discover funding programs your business may be eligible for. To see more personalized funding and business resources, create a Business.NJ.gov account.
